name: Danish Refugee Council Brussels
memberOrga: Board members are senior managers from DRC head quarters in Denmark
goal: The objective of DRC Brussels is to represent and support DRC's overall mission and strategies vis-a-vis relevant EU institutions in Brussels; to strengthen the partnerships DRC has with European Instutions, in particular DG ECHO, DG NEAR, DG DEVCO and EEAS; to actively participate and contribute to influencing policy processes relevant to conflict, displacement, protection and humanitarian response with a focus on protection, protracted crisis and mixed migration.
interests: Development, External Relations, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid
euInitiatives:
Dublin 3 Reform
EU-Turkey Statement
EU Trust Funds
EU Partnerships with third countries , so-called "Migration Compacts"
